Contactless Dining Via Digital Menu

Much you eat, Much healthier you become.

we are now live on app store!

With Bitely, you can dine in the most convenient manner possible. Through the app, you’ll be able to reserve a table at a nearby restaurant and order food right before you arrive at the dining place. This removes any waiting times as much as possible, thereby ensuring that your meals are ready as soon as you arrive. Conveniently place your orders with just a few taps!

How can Bitely grow your business

Find the Best Restaurant and Food Recommendations Nearby

Don’t know which place to dine in or which food to order? Our app will give you the best recommendations so you can check the place and its food then decide whether it suits your planned event or not.

Reserve a Table and Order Food in Advance

No more waiting times! Get to enjoy your meal as soon as you arrive at the place. You can even reserve your table in advance.

Quick Access to a Restaurant’s Menu through QR Scanning on both Phone and Website

Order food instantly on the app by simply scanning a restaurant’s QR code. You’ll get access to their menu where you can place your orders without having to call a waiter. Also works best if you want to order food quickly, especially during busy times.

Access All Features via Website as Well

No need to additionally download the app onto the phone, can access all features via website which makes it easier for the users to use the service quick and download free.
